rooms.description: Open space with a welcoming entrance area leading to the living areas.
Spacious Scandinavian-styled living room with natural light and minimalistic decor.
Adjacent to the kitchen for family dining in a joint family setup.
Modern Scandinavian kitchen with energy-efficient design and open layout.
Dedicated home office area with soundproofing and natural light compliance according to Vastu guidelines.
Spacious bedroom featuring a Scandinavian aesthetic, with built-in storage and a dedicated balcony for relaxation.
Guest bedroom with similar minimalistic design and attached balcony.
Small dressing area adjacent to the master bedroom.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with Vastu guidelines ensuring positive energy flow.
Balconies integrated into master and guest bedrooms for natural light and fresh air, in accordance with Scandinavian design principles.
Access point to the rooftop terrace via a split-level staircase on the ground floor.

rooms.description: Open space serving as a common area for joint family activities and gatherings.
Additional bedroom or playroom to accommodate extended family members.

openings.description: Balconies offering scenic views and additional light for the bedrooms.
Direct access to a spacious rooftop terrace designed with Scandinavian simplicity, featuring greenery and relaxation areas.
